Class IDFixerFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.XMLFilterImpl
      edu.northwestern.at.utils.xml.ExtendedXMLFilterImpl
          edu.northwestern.at.morphadorner.IDFixerFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler, org.xml.sax.XMLFilter, org.xml.sax.XMLReader
public class IDFixerFilter
extends ExtendedXMLFilterImpl

XML filter which updates tag IDs and attributes.

                     java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> splitWords,
                     int totalWords,
                     int totalPageBreaks)
Create ID filter.

Parameters:
reader - The XML reader to filter.
posTags - The part of spech tags.
outFile - The output file name.
maxID - The maximum integer word ID.
sortedWords - Sentence and word numbers sorted by word ID.
splitWords - Split words.
totalWords - Total words.
totalPageBreaks - Total page breaks.

allowOutputWhitespace - True to allow outputting whitespace element for word.

createPseudoPageElement

public PendingElement createPseudoPageElement(java.lang.String uri,
                                              boolean forcedEmit,
                                              boolean start,
                                              java.lang.String path)
Create a pseudo page milestone.

Parameters:
uri - Element URI.
forcedEmit - Emit pseudo page milestone even if not enough words accumulated, as long as at least one word in current block.
start - true if starting milestone, false if ending.
path - Path attribute. May be null.
Returns:
The pseudo page element.
